entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Haines Junction
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with a few flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Windy. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
